name: Vivitech
tag_list: business-software, database-software, database-development, windows-applications, bespoke-software, development-projects, it-application-development
overview:
Vivitech IT Services is a Bespoke Software Development Company specialising in .NET Business Software Development, SQL Server Databases and Mobile Applications. They are also a registered Microsoft Partner Network Member.

Founded in 1993 by a Chartered Electrical Engineer, the company holds many years experience in the Industry and provides services to notable Manufacturers, Retailers and NHS Groups.

They are the founder of the Dispens-IT brand of software currently used with Clinical System Software in Dispensing Doctors Surgeries across the UK.

Vivitech’s software is designed according to their clients requirements, using Agile principles and Object Orientated methods for scalability.
